problem.title: CheckPoint: Yo-Yo - Part 7
problem.p: Consider two cases for a typical yo-yo with a moment of inertia \(I\approx mR^2/2\) about an axis perpendicular to the screen and passing through its center of mass:

Case 1: r is very small so F is applied very near the center of the yo-yo.
Case 2: r=R so F is applied very near the top edge of the yo-yo.
The direction of the friction force will be:

choice.name: foil1
choice.text: To the right in case 1 and to the right in case 2.

choice.name: foil2
choice.text: To the left in case 1 and to the right in case 2.

choice.name: foil4
choice.text: To the right in case 1 and to the left in case 2.

choice.name: foil5
choice.text: To the left in case 1 and to the left in case 2.

choice.name: foil6
choice.text: Need to know exactly the expression of I to answer.
